functional_jobs.job_statement: When navigating the website, I want to easily find events and registration details, so I can participate in community activities.
functional_jobs.pain_points: Difficult navigation, outdated design, lack of comprehensive event information.
functional_jobs.desired_outcomes: A more intuitive website layout that allows for easy browsing and registration for events.
functional_jobs.success_criteria: Users can quickly find and register for events without frustration.

emotional_jobs.job_statement: When I visit the website, I want to feel welcomed and engaged, so I can connect with the community.
emotional_jobs.current_solution: The current website design and content.
emotional_jobs.pain_points: The site feels outdated and uninviting, leading to feelings of disconnection.
emotional_jobs.desired_outcomes: A warm and engaging website that reflects the community spirit.
emotional_jobs.success_criteria: Users report feeling more connected and engaged with the community after visiting the site.

social_jobs.job_statement: When I interact with the website, I want to be perceived as an informed and active community member, so I can build relationships and networks.
social_jobs.current_solution: Limited information available on the website.
social_jobs.pain_points: Difficulty in finding relevant information to engage and connect with others.
social_jobs.desired_outcomes: A comprehensive resource that showcases community involvement and events.
social_jobs.success_criteria: Users feel they can confidently share information and engage with others based on what they've learned from the website.

supporting_jobs.job_statement: When I need assistance, I want self-service options available, so I can resolve issues independently and efficiently.
supporting_jobs.current_solution: Basic customer support without self-service features.
supporting_jobs.pain_points: Reliance on admin or support staff for resolving simple issues.
supporting_jobs.desired_outcomes: An effective self-service support system that empowers users to find solutions.
supporting_jobs.success_criteria: Users are able to resolve their issues independently, reducing the need for support staff intervention.
